mapper.sql: id, name, description, sponsor, upload_date, checker, check_date, status, check_msg, begin_datetime, end_datetime, attender_limit, plan_doc, foster_doc, talents_doc, process_status
mapper.insert:
insert into tb_project
id ,
name ,
description ,
sponsor ,
upload_date ,
checker ,
check_date ,
status ,
check_msg ,
begin_datetime ,
end_datetime ,

plan_doc ,
foster_doc ,

process_status ,

mapper.update:
update tb_project
id = #{id ,jdbcType= BIGINT} ,
name = #{name ,jdbcType= VARCHAR} ,
description = #{description ,jdbcType= VARCHAR} ,
sponsor = #{sponsor ,jdbcType= BIGINT} ,
upload_date = #{uploadDate} ,
checker = #{checker ,jdbcType= BIGINT} ,
check_date = #{checkDate} ,
status = #{status ,jdbcType= TINYINT} ,
check_msg = #{checkMsg ,jdbcType= VARCHAR} ,
begin_datetime = #{beginDatetime} ,
end_datetime = #{endDatetime} ,
attender_limit = #{attenderLimit ,jdbcType= INTEGER} ,
plan_doc = #{planDoc ,jdbcType= VARCHAR} ,
foster_doc = #{fosterDoc ,jdbcType= VARCHAR} ,
talents_doc = #{talentsDoc ,jdbcType= VARCHAR} ,
process_status = #{processStatus ,jdbcType= TINYINT} ,
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
